## blockRendering.Renderer.makePathObject() method

Create a new instance of a renderer path object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
makePathObject(root: SVGElement, style: BlockStyle): IPathObject;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  root | SVGElement | The root SVG element. |
|  style | BlockStyle | The style object to use for colouring. |

**Returns:**

[IPathObject](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.ipathobject_interface.md)

The renderer path object.
